description.en:
Absolute Pure freestyle Perfection.
FOR WHO:
Dedicated freestylers of any level or riders looking for a particularly light in the hands and neutral feeling sail that accelerates instantly.
With countless titles under its belt the Pure is still a market leading freestyle weapon. In 2018 we updated the whole range to keep up with the requirements of an evolving sport. The new Pure has received an injection of acceleration and top speed needed for modern power moves. 
A new clew cut out and redesigned leech twist also improve control and stability. Making the sail super stable for World Champions as well as progressive learners wanting to get into the freestyle disciple.
